hero.title: IA min bɛ Bamanankan kuma
hero.subtitle: Ɲininkali kɛ fɛn bɛɛ kan, kow bɛɛ kan. ekodi bɛ jaabi Bamanankan na: kɛnɛya, kalanko, sɛnɛ, kibaru, tobili, tariku, fɛɛrɛ. Fɛn bɛɛ.
hero.leitmotiv: ekodi bɛ yan. A bɛ i ka kan kuma.

features.title: ekodi bɛ se ka mun kɛ
features.assistant_desc: Ɲininkali kɛ fɛn bɛɛ kan, kow bɛɛ kan. ekodi bɛ jaabi Bamanankan na: kɛnɛya, kalanko, sɛnɛ, kibaru, tobili, tariku, fɛɛrɛ. Fɛn bɛɛ.
features.voice_desc: Kuma bamanankan walima tubabukan na. ekodi bɛ lamɛn, bɛ faamu, ka jaabi da fɛ, i ko kumaɲɔgɔnya tiɲɛ tiɲɛ.
features.translate_desc: Tubabukan ni bamanankan cɛ tɛmɛni ka nɔgɔn. Sɛbɛnni don, sɛbɛnni bɔ. Tiɲɛ ni teliya.
features.tts_desc: ekodi tɛ sɛbɛnni dɔrɔn kɛ. A bɛ kuma. Bamanankan kuma jɛlen, ɲuman.
features.api_desc: Bamanankan hakilitigiya fara i ka porogaramuw kan ni API nɔgɔman ye.

how.title: A man gɛlɛn i ko kumaɲɔgɔnya
how.step2_desc: I ka ciden bɛ sɛgɛsɛgɛ joona

demo.title: A filɛ a baara la
demo.user_msg: ekodi, Mali ko fɔ n ye
demo.ai_msg: Mali ye jamana belebeleba ye, Afriki Tlebi fɛ. Mɔgɔ miliyɔn mugan ni saba, bɛ a kɔnɔ. Bamako de ye a faaba ye... dugu min sigilen bɛ, Ba Joliba da la. Tumbutu, ani Jɛnɛ, olu fana ye dugu kɔrɔba ye. Bamanankan ye kanba ye. Mali ye tariku jamana ye, min ɲɛsinna a ka sini ma.
demo.input_placeholder: Ɲininkali kɛ ekodi fɛ fɛn bɛɛ kan...

api_showcase.title: Bamanankan IA don i ka porogaramu la
api_showcase.subtitle: API REST nɔgɔman min bɛ Bamanankan hakilitigiya fara porogaramu bɛɛ kan.

impact.title: Mun na ekodi bɛ fɛn bɛɛ yɛlɛma
impact.farmer_desc: Sɛnɛkɛla min tɛ se ka kalan walima ka sɛbɛn, o bɛ se sisan ka ɲininkali kɛ sangaso, sugu sɔngɔ walima sɛnɛ fɛɛrɛ kan, a ka kan kuma dɔrɔn. ekodi bɛ diɲɛ dɔnniya di minw tun bɔra a la.
impact.institution_desc: Gɔfɛrɛnɛman, ONG, baaraw: IA dɛmɛbagaw jɔ minw bɛ i ka jama ka kan kuma. Kunnafoni di, dɛmɛ kɛ Bamanankan na.
impact.equality_desc: Afiriki kanw tɛ IA kɔnɔ ka ɲɛ. ekodi bɛ o dancɛ datugu ni modɛli tiɲɛ ye Bamanankan kama ka sira da Mandekan kumabaga miliyɔnw ye.
impact.company_desc: Sosiyete, startup, marka: mɔgɔ miliyɔnw sɔrɔ kan gɛlɛya kɔ. ekodi don ka kuma, ka feere, ka i ka kiliyanw dɛmɛ Bamanankan na yɛrɛ yɛrɛ.

story.proverb: Ka dan tɔw kɔfɛ, a ka tɛmɛ u bɛɛ kan.
story.desc: Bamanankan laadala na, Sambala ɲiɔ ye ɲiɔ ye min bɛ dan tɔw bɛɛ kɔfɛ. Nka a bɛ bonya joona ka tɛmɛ u bɛɛ kan. ekodi bɛ o niyɔrɔ ta: miriya kura, ɲɛtaa ani bɛɛnbaliya min bɛ gɛlɛyaw kunbɛn joona ka fisa. An ye modɛli tiɲɛ jɔ min bɛ se ka baara bi. An bɛɛ ɲɔgɔn fɛ de bɛ a ɲɛnabɔ. An bolo di ka Bamanankan LLM ɲumanba jɔ: ekodi!

project.label: Baara bɛ kɛ a kan
project.title: ekodi porozɛ
project.desc: Ɲininkali kɛ fɛn bɛɛ kan, kow bɛɛ kan. ekodi bɛ jaabi Bamanankan na: kɛnɛya, kalanko, sɛnɛ, kibaru, tobili, tariku, fɛɛrɛ. Fɛn bɛɛ.

pricing.title: Gansan ka an jɔ ɲɔgɔn fɛ
pricing.subtitle: Prompt 10 gansan sɔrɔ ka ekodi dɛmɛ. I ka kɔfɔli bɛ an dɛmɛ ka modɛli kalanni ka ɲɛnabɔ.
pricing.free_features: IA dɛmɛbaga Bamanankan na fɛn bɛɛ kan
pricing.free_feedback: I ka kɔfɔli bɛ modɛli kalanni na

partners.title: Kɛ an ka jɛɲɔgɔn ye
partners.subtitle: ekodi ye porozɛ dayɛlɛnnen ye. An bɛ jɛɲɔgɔnw ɲini ka a ɲɛnabɔli ni a nafaw teliya.
partners.financial_desc: Nafoloda Afiriki IA nataw la. ekodi ɲɛnabɔli dɛmɛ ka teknolozi di mɔgɔ miliyɔnw ma.
partners.technical_desc: I ka IA, NLP, jɔyɔrɔ walima kunnafoni dɔnniya lase. Dɛmɛ modɛli, jɔyɔrɔ walima baarakɛminɛnw na.
partners.expansion_desc: ekodi dɛmɛ ka se jamana kuraw, kan kuraw ani sugu kuraw ma Afiriki tile binyɛ kɔnɔ ani a kɔkan.
partners.promotion_desc: ekodi kɔnɔfoni kɛ i ka jɛkuluw, jɛɲɔgɔnw ani lamɛnbagaw cɛ. Kan kelen kelen bɛɛ bɛ porozɛ bonya.

feedback_cta.title: ekodi bɛ fisa i barakɛ de kosɔn
feedback_cta.subtitle: Nin tɛ robot dɔrɔn ye, a ye modɛli ye min bɛ kalan. Ni i ye jaabi ɲuman walima jugu jira, walima bayɛlɛmani ladilan, i bɛ IA kalanni na yɛrɛ yɛrɛ. ekodi bɛ ɲɛnabɔ i ɲɔgɔnw barakɛ de kosɔn.
feedback_cta.badge: I ka kɔfɔli bɛ modɛli kalanni na
feedback_cta.note: An b'a dɔn ekodi ma dafa fɔlɔ. O de ye kɔrɔ. An dɛmɛ k'a kɛ Bamanankan IA ɲumanba ye diɲɛ kɔnɔ.

ynnov.title: Ynnov ye a jɔ
ynnov.desc: Ynnov bɛ miriya ni laɲini yɛlɛma tiɲɛ ye ni IA fɛɛrɛw ye minw dabɔra Afiriki ni jamana wɛrɛw ye. Sɛgɛsɛgɛli ka taa kunnafoni hakilitigiya ma, Ynnov bɛ jɛkuluw dɛmɛ ka se bonya laban ma.
ynnov.mission: Miriya ka kɛ tiɲɛ ye. IA fɛɛrɛw diɲɛ kɔnɔ nafaw ye.

auth.register_subtitle: Don ekodi la, Bamanankan IA dɛmɛbaga
auth.name: Tɔgɔ

chat.welcome: I ni ce! Bisimila ekodi la
chat.welcome_hint: Ɲininkali kɛ fɛn bɛɛ kan, ne bɛ bamanankan ni tubabukan kuma!

partner_form.title: Kɛ jɛɲɔgɔn ye
partner_form.subtitle: Nin fɔrɔm dafa, an bɛ i jaabi joona.
partner_form.name: I tɔgɔ
partner_form.message_ph: I ka jɛɲɔgɔnya cogoya fɔ ekodi fɛ...
partner_form.success_desc: I ka email porogaramu bɛ yɛlɛ ni ciden labɛnnen ye. A ci, an bɛ i jaabi joona.
